name: StarCross'd
description:
Collect notes from your mysterious partner to find your way back to her.

Use Arrow Keys to move through the world and "E" to pick up notes.

Game made during UW-Stout's fall 48hr Game Jam and winner of Best Visuals.

Coded by Atlas Collins 

Art by Kenealy, Chloe Ferguson, and Caleb Bare

Music "Stars" by Sabine Bloch from the Free Music Archive
